result.title: Number of elements between two iterators?
result.content:
Given a sorted std::set of numbers and two numbers a and b, I need to be able to find the number of elements in the set that are between a and b. I used binary search, but the run time is O(logn + n) because of the time it takes to find the number of elements between two iterators. How can we reduce it to O(logn) time?

edit: I'm trying to implement an algorithm to count the number of intersections among horizontal and vertical line segments in O(nlogn) time.
